item.description:
Thomas Barnes and Kent Taylor are two Secret Service agents assigned to protect President Ashton at a landmark summit on the global war on terror. When President Ashton is shot moments after his arrival in Spain, chaos ensues and disparate lives collide.

Check out the Vantage Point Website for additional details.

After the movie, we can grab a bite at Chatters or one of the local restaurants.

NOTE: The movie time is approximate since times are not posted for next weekend yet. Please check back on Friday for the actual time.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be near the entrance of Chatters.
item.name: Vantage Point
